Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very satisfied and feel i am in good hands.  ** ****** ** ** ********* ****** *** knows exactly what he is doing and knows what his patient need each time. He presented me with such clarity and helped me take right decision. I will personally recommend Dr Aditya.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am satisfied with the doctors consultation. But I am not satisfied with one thing that and this is happening with most of the doctors who are running their own clinic these doctors recommend those medicines which are only available in their pharmacy Lab. And Dr Aditya recommended the medicines which I was not able to purchase from anywhere in Delhi those medicines are only available in his clinic’s pharmacy. Ideally medicines should be Easily available with other medicine stores. But these doctors only recommend the medicines which are available in their pharmacy which ideally should not be the practice Because most of their medicines are very costly. So in terms of medicines I won’t recommend Dr Aditya Singhal to anybody.

review: Very friendly and sharp doctor.  He listened patiently to my problem in detail and quickly diagnosed it.  He explained me the root cause of the problem and suggested therapy in a very understandable manner.  His therapy really worked well for me.

** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ****** *****
I was having joint pain for a long time and was diagnosed as arthritis and hav visited a lot of doctors but no relief for last 1 year .
Dr aditya’s exceptional ********* *** heart whelming counseling made my day and since then i have not had pains .
I will higly recommend him
Thank you very much doctor
